actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to designate the Meat Animal Research Facility located near Clay Center, Nebr., as the Roman L. Hruska Meat Animal Research Facility.

summary.text: Designates the United States Department of Agriculture Meat Animal Research Facility located near Clay Center, Nebraska, as the "Roman L. Hruska Meat Animal Research Facility," in honor of Senator Roman L. Hruska.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Meat Animal Research Facility located near Clay Center, Nebr., as the Roman L. Hruska Meat Animal Research Facility.
